PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-08302014-06-18,  JUS,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectSheila Horn-Bisaillon and Hélène Marmen ** SURVIVORS ANNUITIES ** The Hon. Ivan Bisaillon **
PrecisOrder Amending Order in Council P.C. 2013-665 of June 6, 2013 which granted annuities to SHEILA HORN-BISAILLON and HÉLÈNE MARMEN, survivors of the Hon. Ivan Bisaillon, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, by replacing the amount of $24,996.48 with the amount of $25,877.77 and by replacing the amount of $34,370.16 with the amount of $33, 488.87.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Sheila Horn-Bisaillon and Hélène Marmen  ** SURVIVORS ANNUITIES **  The Hon. Ivan Bisaillon **
precis: Order Amending Order in Council P.C. 2013-665 of June 6, 2013 which granted annuities to SHEILA HORN-BISAILLON and HÉLÈNE MARMEN, survivors of the Hon. Ivan Bisaillon, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, by replacing the amount of $24,996.48 with the amount of $25,877.77 and by replacing the amount of $34,370.16 with the amount of $33, 488.87.
